q1: Who is the best striker in Atletico Madrid
a1: Antoine Griezmann is the best striker for Atletico Madrid.
q2: I would have to say Diego Costa is the best striker in Atletico Madrid.
a2: Who is Atletico Madrid goal keeper?
q3: Antonio Adán is Atletico Madrid's current goalkeeper.
a3: Yes, but the main goalkeeper is Jan Oblak
q5: Even though Jan is the main goalkeeper, are they any good?
a5: Yes, what they lack in defense they make up for on the attack.
